author: lightclient
content: I updated the `devnet-0` spec with 1) a release of the engine api (`v1.0.0-beta.4`) and 2) permalinks to the frozen EIPs. We should be able to consider the EL specs frozen now: https://notes.ethereum.org/@ethpandaops/pectra-devnet-0
